## `ConnectBoxPlotMiddlePoints`

Specifies whether to connect the medians\index{graphs!box plots} between box plots for new projects.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
ConnectBoxPlotMiddlePoints(boolean display)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `boolean` display | `true` to connect the medians. |
:::
